name: Click Money
description:
Want to experience the feeling of a local tyrant?
This is an excellent and interesting game of getting rich!
You can click vigorously like a real capitalist to grow plants to the highest glory!
With this game, you can become the richest capitalist of all time.


Plant a tree that belongs to you,make your pocket rich and cultivate the richest wood in the world in the tree planting app!
Click to create currency, make money out of thin air and experience the feeling of a real capitalist. Isn't it a good feeling?


In the process of planting tree, you can also use rain props or fertilize to make the plants grow faster!
Drop everything that bothers you, start a tree that belongs to you! Make nature more expensive, and let you in the game rich growth!


Just click to become rich and live like a business tycoon. Tap the screen is your greatest wealth!
Start planting your own tree and live the life you always wanted. With just one click, you can become famous in one fell swoop and make a lot of money!
